subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Kentucky edged Florida to reach the Southeastern Conference Final against Vanderbilt, while Memphis, Norfolk State and Coach Pat Knight’s Lamar were among the teams earning N.C.A.A. berths.
snippet: Top-ranked Kentucky edged Florida to reach the Southeastern Conference Final against Vanderbilt, while Memphis, Norfolk State and Coach Pat Knight’s Lamar were among the teams earning N.C.A.A. berths.
